benchmark_details.name: ESG-CID (Disclosure Content Index Finetuning Dataset for Mapping GRI and ESRS)
benchmark_details.overview: We create the ESG-Content Index Dataset (ESG-CID), a dataset leveraging disclosure content indices from ESG reports to facilitate research in the ESG domain and support the development of retrieval models for standardized ESG reporting.

data.source: Disclosures from sustainability and annual reports collected from various companies.
data.annotation: Weakly supervised using disclosure content indices and refined with LLM assessments.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the ranking of document pages rather than individual chunks due to the structure of the dataset.
methodology.interpretation: Higher values in MRR@50 and MAP@50 indicate better retrieval of relevant document pages.
methodology.baseline_results: Fine-tuned models outperform commercial embeddings and leading public models.
methodology.validation: Tested under temporal data splits and cross-report style transfer.
